document_data.name: ''Helm of Unwavering Purpose''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Helm of Unwavering Purpose''''' was an ancient [[magic]]al [[helmet]] of unknown origin.
document_data.Description: The helm was made of pitted [[bronze]]. It featured flaring crest that encircled the rear of the helm starting at the temples.
document_data.Powers: In addition to protecting the wearer from physical harm, the helm rendered them immune to [[spell]]s and spell-like effects that attempted to confuse and addle the mind.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the ''Helm of Unwavering Purpose'' was hidden away in the familial crypts of the dark Korlasz family.
